|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;C2358; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- x86-64 Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6406EM2I-12G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = DIMM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Apacer;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;3.12.74;Sophos UTM 9.5;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.33 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (38400 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, VGA out, power switch, metal case, heat sink, fan |addchip = LPC I/O Controller;Nuvoton;NCT6776F;;1;,,, PCIe 2D VGA Chip;ASPEED Tech;AST1300;;1;,,, 128Kbit SPI Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT25128B;;1;,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM213;;1;,,, FPGA;Lattice Semiconductor;LCMX02-1200UHC;;1;,,, 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02D;;1;,,, 128MB DDR3 SDRAM;Samsung;K4B1G1646G-BCK0;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD17304Q3;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD17505Q5A;;3;,,, Synchronous Buck NexFET Power Block;TI;CSD87330Q3D;;2;,,, Synchronous Buck NexFET Power Block;TI;CSD87350Q5D;;1;,,, 4-lane 4-port PCIe Gen2 Switch;PLX Technology;PEX8605;;2;,,, 3V-28V D-CAP Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;TPS53219A;;3;,,, 4.5-18V 3A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54326;;3;,,, Four Output Differential Buffer for PCIe;Renesas;ICS9DB403D;;1;,,, 30V 18A P-Channel MOSFET;Exelliance MOS Corp;EMB20P03V;;1;,,, 50A Synchronous Buck Gate Driver;International Rectifier;IR3551;;2;,,, 40A Synchronous Buck Gate Driver;International Rectifier;IR3553;;1;,,, 2A Linear Power Low Dropout Regulator;uPI Semiconductor;uP0105;;5;,,, Dual Output 3+2 Phase PWM Controller;International Rectifier;IR3570B;;2; |802dot11_protocols = none

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 11/2015 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Intel Atom]]'' Dual-Core (@1.7GHz) *Memory: 4GB DDR3 (DIMM) RAM *Storage: 8MB CMOS Serial Flash, :64GB Transcend SSD *Network: 8x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 3.33A via barrel
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/sophos/sophos_sg_125_rev_2 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = x86 |subtarget = 64 |arch = x86_64 |support_started_version = 22.03.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
